html:
5.12.21  2:14 am   i love your reality videos, do u plan to release more of them,

      or have u stopped recording them years ago

5.12.21  1:04 am   to finish an idea you started a long time ago, how do you put yourself back in the mindset that originally inspired the thing? i have this song idea based on a feeling of profound sadness that i've since gotten over, but now i'm kind of stuck going back to develop it.
5.12.21  12:32 am   What is the average number of letters per word in the title of your next song?
5.11.21  9:49 pm   thoughts on the semicolon?

5.11.21  9:48 pm   is it time for a scarmbled version of your next song's title?

     If so, what's a scarmbled version of your next song's title?

5.11.21  9:36 pm   Can you show us an example of your "not a boat" synth patch?

     Also curious if you could provide a couple of examples to show the difference between "flute!" and "the good flute"?

5.11.21  9:26 pm   So I think about things all the time but I never write them cause as soon as I start writing them, they feel stupid and meaningless. LIKE HOW DO WRITERS EVEN DO IT, they just sit down and write about meaningless things all day but they make them sound meaningful... and the things become meaningful as a result?

*the rest of this rant was deleted for being too meaningless*


Question: how do you make things that are meaningful without making them feel meaningless?
5.11.21  9:14 pm   would you ever play a song in your future live show before you release it?
5.11.21  8:56 pm   whats the favorite song that you published in 2021
5.11.21  7:53 pm   do you have any advice on answering questions?
5.11.21  7:32 pm   what letter does the title of the next song start with?
5.11.21  7:04 pm   What does "nifty fish" sound like?

5.11.21  6:53 pm   hi bill I need your help.

what is this chord. G#  C  E  B in that order. (there's no G note.) and with G# being the bass note.
5.11.21  5:07 pm   how to be creative
5.11.21  5:00 pm   why are your song names so long
5.11.21  3:29 pm   what is your voice type
5.11.21  3:08 pm   Have the Chinese invaded Ohio?
5.11.21  1:14 pm   5.10.21  2:31 pm   What the hell is "baby hitler"?

5.11.21  12:20 pm   i was in a very bad state mentally for like. the past three years or something, and i felt awful all of the time no matter what, and was in this extreme state of depression and hopelessness. then, suddenly, a few months ago i just started feeling absolutely fantastic for absolutely no reason and have a much more positive outlook on everything in the world. what the hell is up with this
5.11.21  12:01 pm   Do results alone prove the correctness of a process?
5.11.21  11:52 am   is your next song includes letter e?
5.11.21  11:15 am   Just how do you make stuff so fast?
5.11.21  10:14 am   What was the bad thing that you did?
5.11.21  10:10 am   is your next song about one certain common thing in our life?
5.11.21  9:30 am   How many letters are in the title of your next song?
5.11.21  7:59 am   ive never really come up with any lyrics, i kinda need help with it and i dont know wut to do a song about... could you give me some ideas that are school appropriate?

5.11.21  7:41 am   I took piano lessons back in the summer of 2019 and then Covid hit and now I'm pretty sure I've forgotten a lot of things from my lessons. I tried playing the piano in music class one time to just try it out and I didn't remember a thing, no muscle memory or anything. Do you know any tips?
5.11.21  7:03 am   what bad thing did you do?
5.11.21  6:51 am   your thoughts on nuclear power?
5.11.21  5:00 am   how short is the word short

5.11.21  3:00 am   For me, making music with other musicians together in a room is a very pleasant experience, and generally more viscerally pleasant than recording music separately or by myself.

      I know working alone has some clear advantages, but I was wondering, do you get a unique sort of satisfaction when you play with other people?

      What's that experience like for you?

     
Thanks, your work ethic and pragmatism changed my life
5.11.21  2:47 am   Why is Ï€ spelled pi?

5.11.21  12:58 am   what do you use to sing one of your songs?

     
(if there are more, what are they?)
5.10.21  11:00 pm   What's a tip you have for developing interesting chord progressions?

5.10.21  9:30 pm   I've made a few songs but feel like they have no sensible composition since there's no melody, theme, or motif that repeats. Is something that just sort of keeps going but shifts in tone or mood throughout still a good "song"?
5.10.21  6:12 pm   How many words are in the title of the next song?
5.10.21  5:26 pm   do you ever wish you could go back to your old editing style sometimes
5.10.21  4:50 pm   are you planning on making a fourth song in 2021?

5.10.21  3:55 pm   How much every does it get?

5.10.21  3:00 pm   "We don't know where we get our ideas from. What we do know is that we do not get them from our laptops."
How much do you agree with this quote by John Cleese?
